name: .VALA File Extension
summary: Learn about .VALA files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Developer file written in Vala, a programming language used for developing GNOME applications using the GObject system; uses a syntax similar to C# and can be compiled into C code using valac the Vala compiler.

content: Once compiled into C code, developers can compile the C code into an actual program that runs on the target system.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
